body:
- Change maintainer
- Change gearshifft version
- Add patch to rename CMake variable that already exists in newer CMake
  versions
- Take renamed CMake variables for different backends into account
  (`-DGEARSHIFFT_BACKEND_*`)
- Only use GEARSHIFFT_BACKEND_FFTW_PTHREADS if ~openmp
- Explicitly disable float16 support
- Use correct minimum required Boost version
- Add variants for Intel MKL and ROCm rocfft

CC: @psteinb @ax3l @haampie @h-denpo @tldahlgren 

My follow-up to #21437. Installing `gearshifft~cufft~clfft~rocfft~mkl+openmp` and `gearshifft~cufft~clfft~rocfft~mkl~openmp` seems to work fine. The other variants were not tested, yet.
title: gearshifft: Add version 0.4.0, remove faulty version 0.2.0-lw
